column4: I am having some difficulty installing IE6 on wine (winetools). My symptoms are as in bug http://bugs.winehq.org/show_bug.cgi?id=4975 .
I think that IE4 would suffice, but I don't see where/how to install it...
I want to be able to run Outlook over wine to open PST files. No need to connect to exchange, only to open PST files.
